name: The Ever-Evolving Game (Sebastian Scaini)
description:
The Ever-Evolving Game is a game that you can shape however you'd like.

Leave a comment on this page with an addition, change or anything else related to the game and I will add my interpretation of your comment into the game.

Each person may only comment once so choose what you say wisely.

How will this game evolve over time? Let's find out!
